answerText: Diarmuid Ua Duibhne [or Diarmuid O'Dyna; or Diarmid of the Love Spot][10] Diarmuid's love spot caught the eye of Gr치inne, the intended wife of this hero, who as a result later refused to heal a dying Diarmuid. This man gained wisdom after burning himself while cooking the Salmon of Knowledge.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Rutgers-NB + St. Johns A + Haverford | 16 | Mythology | None | College
subject: Mythology
question: Question: He wields a yellow spear known as G치e Buide and a red spear known as G치e Derg, both of which dealt unhealable wounds. For 10 points each: [10] Name this figure who slept with the personification of youth, thereby gaining the ability to make any woman fall in love with him by looking at a spot on his forehead.
